instruction: Missed one dose of warfarin last week; no noticeable symptoms; daughter ensured patient resumed medication immediately.

attributes.narrative: Patient reports missing one dose of warfarin last week. They experienced no noticeable symptoms, and their daughter promptly made sure the medication was resumed right away.

instruction: Advised patient to continue using weekly pill organizer and set phone alerts as a backup reminder to improve warfarin adherence.

coding.display: Education about use of pill box

attributes.comment: Advised patient to continue using weekly pill organizer and set phone alerts as a backup reminder to improve warfarin adherence.
